title: Pls help me

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So I went to play league after a while, the game started to patch... and then it failed, multiple times. I thought this was odd so eventually I uninstalled it, and when I went to reinstall, the screenshot above is the only feedback it ever gave, I looked in my registry to see if I had leftover game files. Nope. I checked to see if I had all the proper files. That wasn't a problem either. At this point I am at a loss, please help me :(

replies.body: Hey don't worry, this can get fixed! This specific error is super common when a security or anti-virus setting is blocking the game from being read.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should allow access and sort out.  Let me know if you have any questions!
